brooklyn.entity.rebind
[Java] Class ImmediateDeltaChangeListener

java.lang.Object
  brooklyn.entity.rebind.ImmediateDeltaChangeListener
All Implemented Interfaces:
ChangeListener
public class ImmediateDeltaChangeListener

Persists changes immediately. This can cause massive CPU load if entities etc are changing frequently (for any serializing / file-based persister implementation).

Authors:
aled
